documents.document: @sweetoblivion1 If he did come he would probably just stare at Camillas tits all evening anyway.
@TrumpHotels Are people of colour allowed at your hotels? Or do you support the Muslim ban? I presume people with orange fake tan are ok...
@GrowFromHereNZ lol no. I've been offered the chance to go bear hunting (I never will) and it made me wonder if they have fleas.
Apparently bears have fleas. Why did I not know this?
@robtreacher Yes. Yes he is.
@kittengloves Its not the size of his hands that bother me, it's the size of his gob.
@muffinmum I saw a book the other day about how you can diet by eating only cakes and desserts.
@furious_coops Lol, if you're hot and off work... What about all the minga's off work? 😁
@Handsprings1 Ahh ok. They're quite interesting.
@Somhairle Doesn't sound like an insult. Sounds like part of Margaret Thatcher.
@Handsprings1 What's with the drafts? Are they your aborted daily tweets? Or simply your musings for later?
@GrowFromHereNZ Sigh. You will never fix the ignorant and small minded.
@AdsmKelly I know that feeling!
@GrowFromHereNZ There was Ivana, then Marla, now Melania
@Handsprings1 Keen to see what song you select for number 30 on the list though.
@Handsprings1 If the rest of it is like that, I'm not sure I could take it. Music is very visual for me.
@Handsprings1 Fark. I immediately got goosebumps on the back of my neck and visualised satanic torture.
@Handsprings1 Is it supposed to sound that creepy???
@antsgardiner Bring back Monica Lewinsky!
@JamesFl Are they rooting on the floor??
@WendyWings Soon you'll be building a fire under the copper, to start boiling your laundry.
@WendyWings You're living like a pioneer #1917
@uncleegor @janewells @dadwroteaporno Rather than ditching Trump, maybe we need Trump porn? Send Bella to check his non-stick surfaces!
@TinCanKicker You gave birth in your sleep to a surprise? 😳
@robtreacher Gets sworn in a little after 6am Sat NZ time
@furious_coops Well how many do you eat per week?
@FLOTUS @MichelleObama I will really miss you, and you were not even my First Lady. Best wishes for your next chapter.
@speedotodd Scratches from a bed pal or a demonic entity?
@leewelshman I'll take that as a yes then. ☺️
@Handsprings1 I wonder what they mean by ...Just the beginning. You buy a cheap door and what, it's haunted? The mug colours are nice.
@Handsprings1 Why Bunnings mugs in particular?
@leewelshman Are you speaking from experience when you compared your leg pain?
@JDu1986 If he's that shallow, he doesn't deserve you. He can date his 0% fat dildo instead.
@buzzandhum Perhaps you could offer to sing at it... I hear he still hasn't got anyone yet.
@Somhairle woody? That keeps me awake sometimes
@AmberSherlock Have you resigned yet? You really should.
Accidentally gave alcoholic chocolate out at work today. It was really popular. Some of those people, I've never heard giggle before.
@Handsprings1 That's one of our NZ charms :)
@Handsprings1 Does Perth feel like the ends of the earth?
@WendyWings I'm going to Melb later this year. Maybe I should invite her for coffee
@WendyWings Money can't buy you class. I wish Pettite F was off the show.
@WendyWings It was painful to watch, especially Janet and Lydia going at each other like a pair of deranged possums.
@GrowFromHereNZ I can recall my parents drenching the vege garden in Derris Dust, back in the day.
That went for rather a long time... #eqnz
This lark of eating raw beetroot for breakfast is certainly going to help with weight loss - because it tastes so bad I almost can't.
@Handsprings1 That's not a bad idea. We should all take pasta to the cemetery and have dinner with the dead. They might be lonely.
@antsgardiner You have seagulls at night?
@wrigglemania Its possible she's lost her voice, what with old age etc. Maybe her best days are behind her now.
@Somhairle Aww. Makes it easier to get to sleep though?
I'm on my post-Xmas detox. The Clove Tea is making my tongue numb. But at least that masks the beetroot/ginger/spinach smoothie taste.
@saniac Are you dehydrated? The heat in summer always wakes me early
@Kiwi_Chatter Define normal though. Have you seen how some people walk?
@chibikuma83 I stayed in Railay a few years back. Very tranquil.
@kittengloves @DebsCWard At least @Kiwi_Chatter hasn't resolved to stop going nude. So we still have something to look forward to in 2017.
@Kiwi_Chatter They probably all recognised you off Twitter 😄
@MattyMcLean I'd say top right is Bake. In that pic i think your knob is pointing to Grill
NOT COOL @richardhammond Really NOT COOL.
@robtreacher I hope Susan Boyle is taking her multi vits over the next few days...
@DLeBrizzle It's Midland Park on Lambton Quay. Has that fountain with all the spurting sperm heads
Wellingtonians, how many of you know where Sperm Park is? Is that a common nickname for it, or not?
Me: So, what are you doing tonight? Her: I'm going to wash my hair, wax my legs... Me: I meant what are you doing for dinner. Her: Oh.
@weeburd1 Well they are wonderful
@weeburd1 JUst got back from a Trans-Atlantic last month. Nothing now until early 2018, when I do a Japan & Russia cruise.
@WendyWings Now I'm really shocked. I can't believe it. ☹️
@dannews Which bus company?
@SelfieMadeBoy Scars can help build character.
@juliryan Same. Did you and Prince Charles call a truce?
@robtreacher I know that feeling. A right hoover lips.
@Kiwi_Chatter That's exciting news!
@buzzandhum @kebabette OMG. Is that supposed to be an insult to the ship?
@kittenypentland You can do it. Hang up your stilettos and go relax
@buzzandhum @JCE_PC Me neither. Who's in it?
@SeanDG You always take the best photos. Mine usually look like a squirrel stole the camera.
@furious_coops Its actually the longest day here. Glory of Summer 😄
@dontforgetjames Would you rather it was a photo of someone else?
@robtreacher Is the tree going to be ok?
@WendyWings Aww I'm sorry to hear that. Is Christmas going to be stressful?
@WendyWings packed up? You're not going to re-do?
@WendyWings How did that happen?
@Kiwi_Chatter Do you partake of the trifle? Do you endow yourself with it?
@WendyWings This time the font is good, but the wording.... https://t.co/YWHdPATaxc
@juliryan Best you avoid travelling to Paris...
@Todd02370 I bet you say that to all the half Italian boys.
@kittenypentland @Artandmylife *Snort* Kitteny, what are you like!
@lyallbaynz That's a relief. Let's hope we never get the real thing.
@muffinmum That looks really fresh and tasty.
@Kiwi_Chatter A truer word was never spoken. Perspective is very important.
@lyallbaynz A whale? What? Where??
@SeanDG Its been years since I last went to the zoo. My friends have iguanas at their house though. Messy things, but interesting to see.
@antsgardiner Some sort of three day Christmas party.
@themoodybrooder Fantastic view from your apartment. I was looking up when I was docked there last month on the Celebrity Eclipse
@juliryan So you've had two kids with your boss, but he still prefers an old cougar over you?
Again with the dodgy font! @WendyWings https://t.co/HEmgHNKyYH
@tobes444 Yes, take the wooden train through the mountains to Stoller. It's gorgeous
@juliryan So your boss is basically Prince Charles
@juliryan How did your boss react to that?
@robtreacher Six kids though... So you know he gets excited sometimes... Paint won't do that.
@publicaddress @sarabeee @brainpicker For a second there, I thought that was Princess Margaret with pigtails.
@robtreacher @GrowFromHereNZ Absolutely. And Refreshment Rooms at Paekak and Taihape again.
@GrowFromHereNZ @robtreacher Tell you what though, I'd bring back NZR. We'd have more trains to everywhere, than you could imagine.
